function: Stick the two ends at two things. Then turn on the switch and the two things will become one. It also works for something that is alive. For example, Doraemon and Nobita fused to make Nobi-emon. Although it was never shown how it is done, but the effect can be reverted.

eng_name: Ultra Special Mighty Strong Super Armor
jp_name: ウルトラ・スペシャルマイティ・ストロングスーパーよろい Urutora supesharumaiti sutorongusūpā yoroi
function: It is said to be an invisible gadget which only wise people can see, and wearing this armor can make the user invincible. Only thing is, this gadget doesn't exist, but Nobita and Gian believe otherwise and think they have became invincible with the gadget.
appears_in: The Emperor's New Clothes!? Super Armor

function:
To ride an Uma-Take, one should probably tame it first. The Uma-Take is a hasty, impatient and aggressive one, so taming it with carrots is a must. Simply put one foot on the 'step', then the Uma-Take itself will jump around and move quickly like a horse. The sound it made are like normal horse footsteps.
The Uma-Take is Nobita's first gadget in the game. It allows his to move very fast but in a jumping motion. When using it to jump, pressing the Y button(get off the Uma-Take) will make Nobita jumps, enabling him to reach higher places.
The Uma-Take can be used to crush enemies like the Stone Lion and Robo-Mouse by jumping on them. Some enemies cannot be damaged by the Uma-Take, causing Nobita to receive damage instead. The Uma-Take cannot be used underwater.
The Uma-Take is listed under number 4 out of 61 gadgets in the game.
appears_in: The Dora Dora Genpei Battle ~Save Yourself Shizuka-chan!~

function:
It works very similar to a diver's suit, it is one of the two ways that people can "dive" underground (the second way is taking the Underground Submarine). Similar to diving in the sea, the "diver" needs air to breathe, however, "divers" need to collect enough air to breathe underground before "diving" as gas bottles are not given with the clothes.
It looks a diving suit in the early 20th century. It has a large helmet which covers the whole head, it should be made from metal. The clothes are made from plastic and it is in orange and red.
With this gadget, users will be able to explore the underground. The vehicles can accommodate up to five or six people.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

function:
The Wishing Star flies to the person calling it and can grant his wishes. However, it is a subject of misunderstandings. For example, if you wish for a baked sea bream (鯛焼き Taiyaki), the gadget gives you a tire (タイヤ Taiya) and a tree (木 Ki).
However, the Wishing Star was useful on one occasion; Nobita uses it to escape Gian and Suneo and it hides him inside a trash bin.
